titleInfo.title: Empirical analysis and the theoretical implications of spatial concentration and dispersion trends in the population distribution in the Federal Republic of Germany

originInfo.publisher: Univ. Bielefeld, Inst. für Bevölkerungsforschung u. Sozialpolitik
